title: Belkinâ€™s new Connect Pro Thunderbolt 4 dock helps you create a complete desk setup
content:
Belkin today announced the Connect Pro Thunderbolt 4 dock for Windows laptops and MacBooks, as well as a standalone Thunderbolt 4 cable. The dock allows users to connect a complete desktop setup to their laptop using a single cable. The dock has a fairly sleek and premium design, with a metal shell protecting most of

The post Belkin’s new Connect Pro Thunderbolt 4 dock helps you create a complete desk setup appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Belkin has launched the new Connect Pro Thunderbolt 4 dock making it easier to connect multiple displays and peripherals to your laptop.
